version_description: Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Guest Wi-Fi: Now you can offer your guests a warm welcome with an easy to use guest network, simplified password sharing, and the ability to share devices of your choosing, such as Chromecast or Wi-Fi speakers. Once connected, guests can visit On.Here on their web browser to see which devices they can access and what apps they can use.

Device naming: Now you can give devices on your network custom names, making them easier to identify. This can help you prioritize a device, so you can do things like watch cat videos uninterrupted.
Minor bug fixes.
Network Check history: Now you can view past Network Check results, including automatic checks, from the past two months.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Home control and Philips Hue lights: Set up control of your Phillips Hue lights in the app -- then anyone connected to OnHub can enter “On.Here” into a browser and see the devices you’ve made available. Philips Hue is the first connected home device that can be accessed and controlled directly from On.Here. No need to clutter your mobile device with any extra apps.
• Network check: The Internet and Wi-Fi speed tests have a brand new look. Results are easy to understand and provide helpful tips on what you can do with your speeds.
Fixes a crashing bug.

The Google On app is now the Google Wifi app and works with both Google Wifi and OnHub. New features include:

• Family Wi-Fi allows you to pause the Wi-Fi on kids’ devices, like during dinnertime
• OnHub is getting our new “mesh technology”. This means you can wirelessly expand your network coverage by adding a Wifi point. Learn more at g.co/wificare

2.0.2: Bug fixes

2.0.0:
The Google On app is now the Google Wifi app and works with both Google Wifi and OnHub. New features include:

• Family Wi-Fi allows you to pause the Wi-Fi on kids’ devices, like during dinnertime
• OnHub is getting our new “mesh technology”. This means you can wirelessly expand your network coverage by adding a Wifi point. Learn more at g.co/wificare
Quickly reserve IP addresses and create port forwarding rules directly from the device details screen.

- Family Wi-Fi: Schedule the devices in your labels to pause automatically whenever you want without lifting a finger.
- Wired Wifi points: Connection status shows if Wifi points are connected via mesh or Ethernet
Family Wi-Fi: Skip or delay an upcoming schedule or end an active schedule early.

IPv6: Enable IPv6 on your Google Wifi.
Wi-Fi Pause: We’ll alert you if you’re about to pause your own device.
Improvements to network check results

Site blocking: Restrict devices or groups of devices from accessing adult websites
Network optimization for time-sensitive data streams: Real-time traffic, such as voice calls and video calls, will perform better.
IPv6: Support for custom DNS
General stability and performance improvements

Family Wi-Fi: Delay a schedule for 30 minutes, even after it starts.
Advanced settings: Customize LAN settings including router IP, subnet, and DHCP address pool.
General stability & performance improvements.

App shortcuts: Quick access to Network Check and Family Wi-Fi from your phone's homescreen

Support for iPhone X
